q: web searches. His vision is nothing less than the etiolation of free will by, and the surrender of individual autonomy to, the all-knowing, all-seeing priestly class at Google. In the future, says Eric Schmidt , one idea is that more and more searches are done on your behalf without you needing to type. There is, of course, a very fine line between on your behalf and without your knowledge or approval. Just as fine is the line between without you needing to type and without you needing to think or
